title: Any Reds out there?
body: How hard would it be to get you guys to play a (normal) game with me and my cousins as a surprise? We dont play too often, but we always talk about how cool it would be to play with a Rioter. And i just thought it would be neat to get in a game and say "give me invites" and a Riot employee jumps in with us :3

replies.body: Sure, let's do it!  Just let me know when! ^-^

Inb4 the Rioter throws the game! (Troll Face.jpg)

Nah, seriously though... It would be interesting to see, though I dunno if I could be nice in the presence of a Rioter. (Most my rage comments are "WTB Skillshots Riot!" Because there are still less than 10% of them that match their animations.)
RiotBamDragon used to play ARAM games with anybody who'd join most nights, but I haven't seen him posting for it lately (haven't been looking, either).
